name: Curren¢
description:
Instructions

WASD - Movement

Q/E - Change between you and your changes

F - Interact

Esc/P - Pause

You are money. You want to be $10 in the end of 5 days.

Special Thanks to @DarrenPang-95 and @Gavin-Chin for helping with the idea.

Mechanics

Day/Night cycle - Day lasts 15 seconds. Night lasts 5 seconds. Night triggers money gain from Forex/Bank and Wallet.

Life Changers - Split yourself into smaller pieces or become a greater note again.

Beggar - Donate a piece of yourself. Cannot be used if no other notes/coins.

Economy - Changes every 6 seconds. Next economy state will have 1/5 chance of being the same economy again. Cannot be used if no other notes/coins.

Forex - Invest a piece of yourself to get double, nothing, or no changes depending on economy state at night. Cannot be used if no other notes/coins.

ATM - Invest a piece of yourself to get 1.5x invested. Cannot be used if no other notes/coins.

Wallet - 5% chance to swoop in for every piece of change you have.

Vending Machine - Goal of the game. Must have exactly $10 to use.

Credits

Cha Ching Register Sound - Muska666 (www.soundbible.com)

Pterodactyl Screech - Mike Koenig (www.soundbible.com)

Deliberate Thought - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

SyncStelar - Game Programmer

AyuTazYumi - Game Artist
